title: @Riot,this is not ok
body:
I demand the presence of the extremely helpful Targons Blade. (or Poro ;")  )

Once again my internet company (i swear croatian net companies run these things on potatoes) f-ed up and my net died for 10 minutes in game,guess what? I get out of the game and get leaver buster,a 20 MINUTE LEAVER BUSTER,I shall not quote but I was told that "the punishments diminish after some time" or rather "after a period of not being afk,leaving etc".

I haven't afkd or left a game in 3 months and i get 20 minutes? I mean I honestly don't care i'l just play something else in the background but what the hell Riot? 
If I was told that punishments diminish after a period,why didn't they,chances are i'm not the only one,so yeah Targo(or Poro ) pls assist me.

replies.body:
It's true, consistently playing without leaves improves your standing with [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  I looked into this for you, and you had 2 leaves in a row and they were ranked too.  :/  You can play something in the background, but I recommend resolving whatever is causing you to leave games.  These leaves have a hugely negative impact on other players in ranked.  :/  

If you have any questions about the system or your specific behavior in general, hit up our[ PB Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) or a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more context, otherwise I hope that helps clear things up.

The first one wasn't actually a "leave" by definition,net died like 1 min before the game ended,enemy had baron and was pushing,
saw minimal harm in it.

The second one was indeed a leave,around 15 min,team probably surrendered at 20,can't do much there.

Resolving is unfortunately impossible as this internet company of mine runs on already previously mentioned potatoes.

WII U WII U WII U rant alert

PORO PLS REMOVE MY LEAVEBUSTER XD {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
